text: Shedubhar (pronounced Amreli) is a village in Amreli Taluka in Amreli District in the Saurashtra region of the western Indian state of Gujarat. The main occupation of the people of Shedubhar village is agriculture, as well as agricultural labour ==Religious place== • Kamnath Mahadev • Panchmukhi Hanuman •Swaminarayan Temple • Khodiyar Temple ==leader== • Manjula Kumbhani • Suresh Kumbhani • Ramesh Kotadiya (President of Village) • Ghanshyam Polara (Vice President of Village) Category:Villages in Gujarat
title: Shedubhar
